text: Mona Malm (born Mona Kristina Ericsson; 24 January 1935 – 12 January 2021) was a Swedish actress. Her career began in 1957.Skådespelerskan Mona Malm är död SVT. Retrieved 14 January 2021. Malm was born in Stockholm. Malm was known for her roles in Smiles of a Summer Night (1955), The Seventh Seal (1957),Ingmar Bergman movies: 25 greatest films ranked worst to best goldderby.com. Retrieved 14 January 2021. All These Women (1964), Heja Roland! (1966), Fanny and Alexander (1982), Nånting levande åt Lame-Kal (1988), The Best Intentions (1992), The Tattooed Widow (1998) and After the Wedding (2006). Malm died at a Stockholm hospital on 12 January 2021, at the age of 85.Mona Malm är död Svenska Dagbladet. Retrieved 14 January 2021.Skådespelaren Mona Malm är död Dagens Nyheter. title: Mona Malm
